tool_description: Manages point expiration dates and processes expired points according to program rules.

check_date.description: Date to check for expiring points

expiration_warning_days.description: Days before expiration to send warning

error_messages: Invalid customer_id: Customer must exist in the loyalty program.
Invalid check_date: Must be valid ISO 8601 format.
Invalid expiration_warning_days: Must be positive integer between 1 and 365.
No point records found: Customer has no points with expiration dates.
usage: Provide customer_id and check_date to process point expiration. Optionally set expiration_warning_days for early notifications.

points_expired.description: Total points that expired on check_date

next_expiration_date.description: Date when next points will expire

current_balance.description: Customer's point balance after processing expirations
